document.docAuthor: Mojica, José Ivan & Agudelo-Zamora, Henry D.
document.masterDocTitle: Historical review, catalog of type specimens and online database of the ichthyology collection of the Instituto de Ciencias Naturales of the Universidad Nacional de Colombia (ICN-MHN)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Historical review, catalog of type specimens and online database of the ichthyology collection of the Instituto de Ciencias Naturales of the Universidad Nacional de Colombia (ICN-MHN)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Bryconamericus cristiani Román-Valencia, 1999: 110
, fig. 1. Holotype ( Fig. 6 ): ICN-MHN 3445, male (62.0 mm SL). Colombia , Meta , along the road Villavicencio–Acacias , vereda
Brisas de Guayuriba
, close to school crossing the bridge of Guayuriba River , Caño Cayupe , tributary of Guayuriba River , upper Meta , eastern versant, Cordillera Oriental , 04°07’N , 74°15'W ; G. Galvis ,
Oct 1995
.
Paratypes : ICN-MHN 3446 (9, 35.2–68.7 mm SL), collected with the holotype . ICN-MHN 3447 (7, 68.0– 63. 9 mm SL), Colombia , Casanare , road Yopal – El Morro , Cravo Sur River basin, quebrada Aguatoca ; J. Hernández ,
18 Feb 1998
.
ICN-MHN 3448 (5, 50.3–55.1 mm SL), Colombia , Meta , Cubarral, Ariari River ; G. Galvis. ICN-MHN 3449 (3, 48.0– 57.8 mm SL), Colombia , Meta , in the road

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Villavicencio–Acacias close to Guayuriba Bridge, quebrada La Unión , tributary of Guayuriba River , upper Meta ; G. Galvis ,
Oct 1995
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks: currently treated as
Hemibrycon cristiani (Thomaz et al ., 2015)
.

of right margin, quebrada Angostura , Mira River basin; G. Galvis ,

, Patia River basin; G. Arango ,
31 Jan 1980
.
ICN-MHN 4881(3, 46.7–66.2 mm SL), Colombia , Nariño , Nambi River , Patia River basin; G. Galvis ,
Mar 1995
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks: Román-Valencia (2000) cited the lot ICN-MHN 2339 as presenting 21 specimens but we found instead 31 specimens , and for the lot ICN-MHN 2349 seven specimens, while we found 12 specimens . Currently treated as
Eretmobrycon dahli (Thomaz et al ., 2015)
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Creagrutus nigrostigmatus
Dahl, 1960c : 353
, unnumbered fig. Neotype ( Fig. 14 ): ICN-MHN 989 ( 23.4 mm SL) (designated by
Harold & Vari, 1994 : 10
), Colombia , Bolívar , Toluviejo, Arroyo (Caño) Pechilín, a small stream draining into the Caribbean Sea, west of the Magdalena River; C. Román-Valencia, 13 Nov 1985 .

subSubSection.paragraph: Remarks : the type series was lost according to Cala (1981) and Román-Valencia & Cala (1997) . Dahl (1960c) indicate that some paratypes were sent to the Museo Departamental de Montería, an institution that we were unable to trace. The neotype (ICN-MHN 989) was found in the general collection with five other specimens. In the redescription of the species, Harold & Vari (1994:10) did not assigned a new catalog number for these specimens, citing them as: …” ICNMHN ex. 989, 7 (17.5–20.5, collected with the neotype )…”. For these specimens, we assigned a new catalog number, ICN-MHN 19385.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Gephyrocharax sinuensis
Dahl & Medem, 1964 :1
, unnumbered fig. Neotype : ICN-MHN 18999, male ( 32.1 mm SL) (designated by Vanegas-Ríos, 2017: 6), Colombia , Córdoba , upper Sinú River , western versant, Cordillera Occidental; G. Dahl ,
Dec 1958
. Paratypes : ICN-MHN 749 (78, 16.1–40.8 mm SL), collected with the neotype
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Remarks: the paratypes were loaned to S. Weitzman ( USNM ) and still have not being returned to ICN-MHN. The annotation of the loan invoice indicates 80 specimens , but Vanegas-Ríos (2016) cited 78 specimens , while in the catalog the count is given as 72 specimens .

materialsCitation.treatmentCitationGroup:
Hemibrycon carrilloi
Dahl, 1960a : 467
, unnumbered fig. Paratypes ( Fig. 15 ): ICN-MHN 126 (3, 29.3–50 mm SL), Colombia , Chocó , Paravandó, Baudó River system; G. Dahl ,
23 Nov 1959
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Remarks : Dahl (1960a) cited four paratypes , one collected with the holotype (Quebrada La Noche, tributary to the upper Atrato, 23 Nov 1959 ) and three additional paratypes from Paravandó, Baudó River system. These latter paratypes were found in the general collection with a new identification, but fortunately with the original old label intact.

Parastremma alba
Dahl, 1960a : 475
, unnumbered fig. Holotype ICN-MHN 147, male (95.0 mm SL): Colombia , Chocó , Becordó, Sandó River , tributary of Baudó River , western versant, Cordillera Occidental; G. Dahl ,
29 Nov 1959
.
Paratype :
ICN-MHN 147a, female (80.0 mm SL). Colombia , Chocó , Chigorodo, River Baudó ; G. Dahl ,
24 Nov 1959
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks: Currently as
Parastremma album
. The type series was loaned to S. Weitzman in the 80´s and later was sent to Barry Chernoff at FMNH (Kris Murphy pers. comm). Currently at FMNH .
